meanings.definition: Walks slowly and with heavy steps
meanings.sent1: He trudges wearily home from school.
meanings.sent2: She trudges along the path, dragging her feet.
meanings.sent3: The tired old dog trudges slowly behind his owner.
meanings.sent4: Time trudges on, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The elephant trudges through the muddy swamp.

meanings.sent1: After a long day, he trudges up the stairs to bed.
meanings.sent2: The worker trudges through the factory, exhausted.
meanings.sent3: The zombie trudges aimlessly through the graveyard.
meanings.sent4: The snail trudges along at its own slow pace.
meanings.sent5: The old car trudges up the steep hill, struggling with each turn of the wheel.

meanings.sent1: She trudges through the thick snow to reach the cabin.
meanings.sent2: The explorer trudges across the desert, searching for water.
meanings.sent3: The ant trudges back to its nest carrying a heavy crumb.
meanings.sent4: The river trudges through the valley, carving its path over time.
meanings.sent5: The hiker trudges up the mountain, determined to reach the summit.
